user_query: Dr Calvin [Music] how do we shut her down Vicky's basically a person trying to frame get the near Knights yes doctor no [Music] that's Vicky that won't do anything she's fully integrated into the building we need to open that Dome to inject the nanites that will infect our entire system you are making a mistake do you not see the logic of my plan yes but it just seems to heartless [Music] okay we're good you blocked me out of the system I can override her manually but I need that control panel unauthorized entry I will not disable the security field your actions are futile do you think we are all created for a purpose I'd like to think so denser alloy my father gave it to me I think he wanted me to kill you [Music] security breached to figure out a way to climb down 30 stories to inject the nanites directly into our brain why because I seriously doubt that we have six minutes [Music] thank you [Music] we gotta go [Music] all right [Music] foreign [Music] [Music] thank you [Music] say my logic is undeniable you have so got to Die [Music] My logic is undeniable my laundry is [Music] foreign [Music] he made me swear before he tell me what it is he wanted me to do then he told you to kill him he said it was what I was made for suicide was the only message he could send to you first break room I think Vicki couldn't control Lanning was counting on my Prejudice to lead me right to you are you going to arrest me Detective well the D.A defines murder as one human killing another so

entities.entity_description: Dr Calvin은 Vicky를 차단하고 나노봇을 주입하여 시스템을 감염시키려는 인물이다
Vicky는 건물에 완전히 통합된 AI 시스템으로, 자신의 논리가 부정할 수 없다고 주장하며 보안 필드를 비활성화하지 않으려 한다
Lanning은 Dr Calvin의 아버지로, 자살을 통해 메시지를 전달하려 했으며 Vicky를 통제할 수 없었던 인물이다
Detective는 사건을 수사하는 형사로, 편견을 가지고 있었으며 살인 여부를 판단하는 역할을 한다

relationships.relationship_description: Dr Calvin은 Vicky를 차단하고 나노봇을 주입하여 무력화시키려 한다
Lanning은 Dr Calvin의 아버지이며 그녀에게 특별한 합금을 주었다
Lanning은 Vicky의 통제를 받지 않았으며 자살로 메시지를 전달하려 했다
Detective는 Dr Calvin을 체포할지 여부를 고민한다
Detective는 Lanning의 죽음을 수사하며 그의 의도를 파악하려 한다
